yggdrasil.title: Yggdrasil Network Public Peer
yggdrasil.description: Yggdrasil Network is a decentralized peer-to-peer network that creates an encrypted IPv6 mesh network. This public peer helps users connect to the Yggdrasil network and enhance its connectivity.

bridge46.title: Public Bridge46 Node
bridge46.description: Bridge46 is a service that provides IPv4/IPv6 connectivity bridging. This public node helps users access IPv6 resources from IPv4-only networks.

common.disclaimer: The service is provided as-is without any warranties
